005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint.Level;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationFinding.Kind;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationResult;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.LinkedList;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.regex.Pattern;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public class FindingCollectingConstraintValidationHandler
026    extends AbstractConstraintValidationHandler
027    implements IValidationResult {
028  @NonNull
029  private final List<ConstraintValidationFinding> findings = new LinkedList<>();
030  @NonNull
031  private Level highestLevel = IConstraint.Level.INFORMATIONAL;
032
033  @Override
034  @NonNull
035  public List<ConstraintValidationFinding> getFindings() {
036    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(findings);
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  @NonNull
041  public Level getHighestSeverity() {
042    return highestLevel;
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Add a finding to the collection of findings maintained by this instance.
047   *
048   * @param finding
049   *          the finding to add
050   */
051  protected void addFinding(@NonNull ConstraintValidationFinding finding) {
052    findings.add(finding);
053
054    Level severity = finding.getSeverity();
055    if (severity.ordinal() > highestLevel.ordinal()) {
056      highestLevel = severity;
057    }
058  }
059
060  @NonNull
061  private static Kind toKind(@NonNull Level level) {
062    Kind retval;
063    switch (level) {
064    case CRITICAL:
065    case ERROR:
066      retval = Kind.FAIL;
067      break;
068    case INFORMATIONAL:
069    case DEBUG:
070    case NONE:
071      retval = Kind.INFORMATIONAL;
072      break;
073    case WARNING:
074      retval = Kind.PASS;
075      break;
076    default:
077      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported level '%s'.", level));
078    }
079
080    return retval;
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public void handleCardinalityMinimumViolation(
085      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
086      @NonNull INodeItem node,
087      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets) {
088    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
089        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
090        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
091        .target(node)
092        .subjects(targets.getValue())
093        .message(newCardinalityMinimumViolationMessage(constraint, node, targets))
094        .build());
095  }
096
097  @Override
098  public void handleCardinalityMaximumViolation(
099      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
100      @NonNull INodeItem node,
101      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets) {
102    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
103        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
104        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
105        .target(node)
106        .subjects(targets.getValue())
107        .message(newCardinalityMaximumViolationMessage(constraint, node, targets))
108        .build());
109  }
110
111  @Override
112  public void handleIndexDuplicateKeyViolation(
113      @NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint,
114      @NonNull INodeItem node,
115      @NonNull INodeItem oldItem,
116      @NonNull INodeItem target) {
117    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
118        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
119        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
120        .target(target)
121        .message(newIndexDuplicateKeyViolationMessage(constraint, node, oldItem, target))
122        .build());
123  }
124
125  @Override
126  public void handleUniqueKeyViolation(
127      @NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint,
128      @NonNull INodeItem node,
129      @NonNull INodeItem oldItem,
130      @NonNull INodeItem target) {
131    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
132        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
133        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
134        .target(target)
135        .message(newUniqueKeyViolationMessage(constraint, node, oldItem, target))
136        .build());
137  }
138
139  @SuppressWarnings("null")
140  @Override
141  public void handleKeyMatchError(
142      @NonNull IKeyConstraint constraint,
143      @NonNull INodeItem node,
144      @NonNull INodeItem target,
145      @NonNull MetapathException cause) {
146    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
147        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
148        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
149        .target(target)
150        .message(cause.getLocalizedMessage())
151        .cause(cause)
152        .build());
153  }
154
155  @Override
156  public void handleMatchPatternViolation(
157      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
158      @NonNull INodeItem node,
159      @NonNull INodeItem target,
160      @NonNull String value,
161      @NonNull Pattern pattern) {
162    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
163        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
164        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
165        .target(target)
166        .message(newMatchPatternViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, value, pattern))
167        .build());
168  }
169
170  @Override
171  public void handleMatchDatatypeViolation(
172      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
173      @NonNull INodeItem node,
174      @NonNull INodeItem target,
175      @NonNull String value,
176      @NonNull IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter,
177      @NonNull IllegalArgumentException cause) {
178    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
179        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
180        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
181        .target(target)
182        .message(newMatchDatatypeViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, value, adapter))
183        .cause(cause)
184        .build());
185  }
186
187  @Override
188  public void handleExpectViolation(
189      @NonNull IExpectConstraint constraint,
190      @NonNull INodeItem node,
191      @NonNull INodeItem target,
192      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
193    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
194        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
195        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
196        .target(target)
197        .message(newExpectViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, dynamicContext))
198        .build());
199  }
200
201  @Override
202  public void handleAllowedValuesViolation(
203      @NonNull List<IAllowedValuesConstraint> failedConstraints,
204      @NonNull INodeItem target) {
205    Level maxLevel = ObjectUtils.notNull(failedConstraints.stream()
206        .map(IAllowedValuesConstraint::getLevel)
207        .reduce(Level.NONE, (l1, l2) -> l1.ordinal() >= l2.ordinal() ? l1 : l2));
208
209    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(failedConstraints, target)
210        .severity(maxLevel)
211        .kind(toKind(maxLevel))
212        .target(target)
213        .message(newAllowedValuesViolationMessage(failedConstraints, target))
214        .build());
215  }
216
217  @Override
218  public void handleIndexDuplicateViolation(IIndexConstraint constraint, INodeItem node) {
219    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
220        .kind(Kind.FAIL)
221        .severity(Level.CRITICAL)
222        .target(node)
223        .message(newIndexDuplicateViolationMessage(constraint, node))
224        .build());
225  }
226
227  @Override
228  public void handleIndexMiss(IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint, INodeItem node, INodeItem target, List<String> key) {
229    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
230        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
231        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
232        .target(target)
233        .message(newIndexMissMessage(constraint, node, target, key))
234        .build());
235  }
236
237  @Override
238  public void handleMissingIndexViolation(
239      IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
240      INodeItem node,
241      INodeItem target,
242      String message) {
243    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
244        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
245        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
246        .target(target)
247        .message(newMissingIndexViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, message))
248        .build());
249  }
250
251  @Override
252  public void handlePass(IConstraint constraint, INodeItem node, INodeItem target) {
253    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
254        .kind(Kind.PASS)
255        .severity(Level.NONE)
256        .target(target)
257        .build());
258  }
259
260  @Override
261  public void handleError(
262      IConstraint constraint,
263      INodeItem node,
264      String message,
265      Throwable exception) {
266    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
267        .kind(Kind.FAIL)
268        .severity(Level.CRITICAL)
269        .target(node)
270        .message(message)
271        .cause(exception)
272        .build());
273  }
274}
